headline.main: No Seat at Table for Soccer Players’ Union

docs.snippet: Mr. Clancy’s books were successfully transformed into blockbuster Hollywood films, including “Patriot Games,” “The Hunt for Red October” and “Clear and Present Danger.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Clancy’s books were successfully transformed into blockbuster Hollywood films, including “Patriot Games,” “The Hunt for Red October” and “Clear and Present Danger.”
docs.abstract: Tom Clancy, best-selling writer of military thrillers, dies at age 66; Clancy's novels spawned genre and made him one of world's best-known and best-selling authors, with  many of his novels turned into blockbuster Hollywood films.

headline.main: Tom Clancy, Best-Selling Master of Military Thrillers, Dies at 66
headline.print_headline: Tom Clancy, Best-Selling Master of Military Thrillers, Dies at 66
